alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 4:43PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Nye, western White Pine and south central Eureka Counties through 530 PM PDT... At 443 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 20 miles southwest of Pinto Summit, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Nye, western White Pine and south central Eureka Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Nye County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; White Pine County
